titles.title: Patient Choice Restoration Act
A bill to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/7/2013--Introduced. Patient Choice Restoration Act - Repeals the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010. Restores provisions of law amended by such Acts.
